import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import CustomCalerdar from "../../calendar/CustomCalerdar"; import Form from "../../mixin/Form"; import { Checkbox, CheckboxLabel, OptionsContainer, StartButton, Input, } from "../../mixin/Mixin"; const Container = styled.div` width: 100vw; display: flex; justify-content: center; `; const ColorIndicator = styled.div` width: 40px; height: 20px; background-color: ${(props) => props.bgColor}; `; const DatePicker = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; `; const PlanningETC = ({ selectedDate = null }) => { console.log("ETC 페이지", selectedDate); return (
순서
일단 그냥 모양만 낸건데 가만 생각해보면 나중에 어차피 로그인할때 있었던거 비슷하게 가져올거같기는 한듯 코스 검색
); }; export default PlanningETC;
